"Smart Brush" - A toothbrush with sensors that can detect plaque buildup and pressure, providing real-time feedback to the user on their brushing technique.
"Toothbrush withothos" - A toothbrush with a built-in microphone that can play music to help distract the user during brushing, making it more enjoyable.

"Toothbrush with a built-in camera" - A toothbrush with a built-in camera that can take photos of the user's teeth, providing feedback on their oral health and helping them track their progress over time.

"Toothbrush with a built-in AI assistant" - A toothbrush with a built-in AI assistant that can provide personalized recommendations for oral care, including brushing time, toothpaste type, and dietary changes.
"Toothbrush with a built-in LED light" - A toothbrush with a built-in LED light that can help illuminate hard-to-reach areas of the mouth, making it easier to clean teeth and gums.
